channel.title: [C4D] Living Room (2 rooms)
channel.description:
Note: I cant access C4D because my Vista doesn't work atm and im on ubuntu, where i have no c4d. Ill post when i have updated it.
Another room im working on, i need CC though because i cant see everything thats wrong myself. I modeled all the furniture individually and saved them so i could load them after the room design was done.
I know the carpet is to big, it has been fixed. [img]http://img216.imageshack.us/img216/894/livingroom1ir1.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img266.imageshack.us/img266/797/livingroom2tn2.jpg[/img]
I still need more things but i need basic room advice.
